scripts.stop: npm run wp db export sql/local.sql && wp-env stop
scripts.build: npm run check && npm run compile
scripts.zip:pack: npm run clean-zip-directory && rsync -a --exclude='/vendor' --exclude='/node_modules' --exclude='.*' --exclude='*.config.js' --exclude='*.xml.dist' --exclude='*.ruleset.xml' --exclude='package*.json' . cormorant && cd cormorant && composer install --no-dev
scripts.zip:archive: npm run clean-zip && zip -9 -qmr cormorant.zip cormorant
scripts.zip: npm run zip:pack && cd cormorant && composer install --no-dev && cd ../ && npm run zip:archive
